wavgen

utilities¶

wavgen.helper.gaussian1d(x, x0, w0, A, offset)¶

Returns intensity profile of 1d gaussian beam x0: x-offset w0: waist of Gaussian beam A: Amplitude offset: Global offset

wavgen.helper.gaussianarray1d(x, x0_vec, wx_vec, A_vec, offset, ntraps)¶

Returns intensity profile of trap array x0_vec: 1-by-ntraps array of x-offsets of traps wx_vec: 1-by-ntraps array of waists of traps A_vec: 1-by-ntraps array of amplitudes of traps offset: global offset ntraps: Number of traps

wavgen.helper.wrapper_fit_func(x, ntraps, *args)¶

Juggles parameters in order to be able to fit a list of parameters

wavgen.helper.plot_image(which_cam, image, ntraps, plot_num=0, fit=None, guess=False)¶

Scans the given image for the ‘ntraps’ number of trap intensity peaks. Then plots the set of 1-dimensional gaussian profiles.

wavgen.helper.analyze_image(which_cam, cam, ntraps, step_num=0, iterations=20)¶

Scans the given image for the ‘ntraps’ number of trap intensity peaks. Then extracts the 1-dimensional gaussian profiles across the traps and returns a list of the amplitudes.

wavgen.helper.fix_exposure(cam, slider, verbose=False)¶

Given the opened camera object and the Slider object connected to the camera’s exposure, adjusts the exposure to just below clipping. Binary Search
